version_description: We've squashed some bugs
We've squashed some bugs

You told us, we listened. Some exciting upgrades are in this update.
•Remember me – the app will remember your username and password so you don’t have to. Just another way Triangle makes life easier.
•Easily add your Triangle Rewards card to Apple Wallet – happy shopping!
•We've squashed some bugs

Version 1.0.10
• We’ve added increased profile security to the Email Account Validation process
• We’ve made some updates so it will be quicker and easier to view your credit card transactions and account history

Version 1.0.11
• We've made some changes to make things run smoother and squash some little bugs. Still lacing up our boots to stamp out one or two bigger ones.

Version 1.0.11
• We've made some changes to make things run smoother and squash some little bugs. Still lacing up our boots to stamp out one or two bigger ones.

Version 1.0.12
In a nutshell, we’ve made it easier for you to register, view account screen details and more!
• Registration is smoother, making it easier for you to register, get access, get help and add a rewards card to Wallet
• Viewing credit card transactions and account history is faster and easier from the account screen
• Gas Advantage® and Cash Advantage® cardholders now have a quicker route to getting a new digital rewards card

Can you believe we fit all that in a nutshell?

Can you believe we fit all that in a nutshell?

Version 1.0.13

We’re listening, we’re improving to help you, and we’re excited about it!

Here’s what’s new:
• New warning fail-safes to keep you from locking yourself out
• Access your bar code easier from the app – no more scrambling to get it ready in line

version_name: 1.1.1UPDATE: We’ve also addressed an unexpected access issue experienced by iPhone 5

version_description:
Version 1.1.0

You asked. We delivered. Credit card login just got easier!

The sign-in screen has been upgraded, allowing you to choose between your Triangle Rewards™ account and your credit card account.

Credit card holders can now sign in directly to their online account for quicker access to transactions, account balances and activity history.

version_name: 1.1.1UPDATE: We’ve also addressed an unexpected access issue experienced by iPhone 5

version_description:
Version 1.1.0

You asked. We delivered. Credit card login just got easier!

The sign-in screen has been upgraded, allowing you to choose between your Triangle Rewards™ account and your credit card account.

Credit card holders can now sign in directly to their online account for quicker access to transactions, account balances and activity history.

Version 1.1.1

UPDATE: We’ve also addressed an unexpected access issue experienced by iPhone 5, 5c, and 5s users.

You asked. We delivered. Credit card login just got easier!

The sign-in screen has been upgraded, allowing you to choose between your Triangle Rewards™ account and your credit card account.

Credit card holders can now sign in directly to their online account for quicker access to transactions, account balances and activity history.

Also, on the heels of our previous patch, the easy-access barcode is also back. Avoid the scramble in line when you scan!

Version 1.1.1

UPDATE: We’ve also addressed an unexpected access issue experienced by iPhone 5, 5c, and 5s users.

You asked. We delivered. Credit card login just got easier!

The sign-in screen has been upgraded, allowing you to choose between your Triangle Rewards™ account and your credit card account.

Credit card holders can now sign in directly to their online account for quicker access to transactions, account balances and activity history.

Also, on the heels of our previous patch, the easy-access barcode is also back. Avoid the scramble in line when you scan!

v.1.1.3

Fine-Tuning and Improving!

What’s new?
• Send app feedback via email from the Support and Contact Us screens
• The Offers tab has been fine-tuned with the aim of keeping personalized offers relevant to you
• Some images in the Offers tab didn’t look quite right, and we’ve made the first of many small improvements to fix this

We’re just getting started. Look out for more improvements on the way in 2019!

v.1.1.3

Fine-Tuning and Improving!

What’s new?
• Send app feedback via email from the Support and Contact Us screens
• The Offers tab has been fine-tuned with the aim of keeping personalized offers relevant to you
• Some images in the Offers tab didn’t look quite right, and we’ve made the first of many small improvements to fix this

We’re just getting started. Look out for more improvements on the way in 2019!

v.1.1.4

What’s new?

In the first of two updates, we’ve spent time exploring improvements to security and performance. Just like people, it’s healthy for our app to practice a little “self-care” sometimes.

You’ll need this update to access the Triangle app, so make sure you hit that update button!

v.1.1.4

What’s new?

In the first of two updates, we’ve spent time exploring improvements to security and performance. Just like people, it’s healthy for our app to practice a little “self-care” sometimes.

You’ll need this update to access the Triangle app, so make sure you hit that update button!

v.1.1.5

What’s new?

This is the second of two releases aimed at enhancing security and performance.
We’ve uncovered some bugs, swept them up and deposited them safely outside our app environment!

v.1.1.5

What’s new?

This is the second of two releases aimed at enhancing security and performance.
We’ve uncovered some bugs, swept them up and deposited them safely outside our app environment!
What have we been up to? We’ve made some bug fixes and registration improvements. Just a little Spring cleaning to keep your app working smoothly!
What have we been up to? We’ve made some bug fixes and registration improvements. Just a little Spring cleaning to keep your app working smoothly!
We've made some changes to make our app run smoother.
We've made some changes to make our app run smoother.

We’ve upgraded our sign in process with Triangle ID! Triangle ID is a new, easy way to login to your Triangle Rewards™ account with just a single username and password. If you have a Triangle Rewards or Canadian Tire account, it will automatically function as your Triangle ID.

If you sign in with Online Account credit card credentials, sign in as you normally would.

We’ve upgraded our sign in process with Triangle ID! Triangle ID is a new, easy way to login to your Triangle Rewards™ account with just a single username and password. If you have a Triangle Rewards or Canadian Tire account, it will automatically function as your Triangle ID.

If you sign in with Online Account credit card credentials, sign in as you normally would.

What’s New? Access to more features for Triangle Mastercard cardholders – that’s what!

When you sign in using your online credit card credentials, you can now access:
•Triangle Rewards digital barcode
•Message Centre with updates on promotions like Triangle Bonus days
•Exclusive offers tailored to you – activate and redeem on the fly

We’ve also updated our Digital Terms and Conditions. They’re not exciting, but very necessary, so give them a look.

What’s New? Access to more features for Triangle Mastercard cardholders – that’s what!

When you sign in using your online credit card credentials, you can now access:
•Triangle Rewards digital barcode
•Message Centre with updates on promotions like Triangle Bonus days
•Exclusive offers tailored to you – activate and redeem on the fly

We’ve also updated our Digital Terms and Conditions. They’re not exciting, but very necessary, so give them a look.

What’s New in this release:
• Quicker access to your Digital Rewards Card within the app, making earning Canadian Tire money - easier.
• Bug fixes that have been affecting certain users.

What’s New in this release:
• Quicker access to your Digital Rewards Card within the app, making earning Canadian Tire money - easier.
• Bug fixes that have been affecting certain users.

Fine-Tuning and Improving!

We've made some changes to make things run smoother and squash some bugs. Still lacing up our boots to stamp out one or two bigger ones.

Fine-Tuning and Improving!

We've made some changes to make things run smoother and squash some bugs. Still lacing up our boots to stamp out one or two bigger ones.

• We’ve made an important security update. Be sure to update to avoid issues accessing your account.
• Easier access to make a payment on your Mastercard statement.
• FaceID was causing people to be signed back in after signing out. We’ve fixed it so now when you sign out, you will remain signed out.

• FaceID was causing people to be signed back in after signing out. We’ve fixed it so now when you sign out, you will remain signed out.
